title: Modern Family House
Description: A stylish and modern family home featuring spacious living areas, three comfortable bedrooms, and a beautifully kept private garden. Perfect for families looking for a peaceful lifestyle while staying close to local amenities and transport links.

title: City Centre Flat
Description: A contemporary city apartment located right in the heart of the action. This two-bedroom flat offers bright open-plan living, modern interiors, and excellent access to shops, restaurants, and public transport — ideal for professionals or commuters.

title: Luxury Detached Villa
Description: An elegant detached villa designed for luxury living. This stunning property offers premium finishes, landscaped gardens, generous living space, and private parking — perfect for buyers seeking comfort, privacy, and style.

title: Affordable Starter Flat
Description: A compact and budget-friendly one-bedroom flat — the perfect first home or investment opportunity. Conveniently located near public transport and local services, offering simple, low-maintenance living.

title: Suburban Townhouse
Description: A spacious three-bedroom townhouse set in a quiet suburban neighborhood. With comfortable living spaces and a welcoming atmosphere, this property is ideal for families looking for a calm and friendly residential area.

title: Penthouse Apartment
Description: A luxury penthouse apartment boasting impressive skyline views. Featuring premium finishes, bright open-plan living, and panoramic windows — ideal for buyers seeking sophisticated city living with a touch of exclusivity.

title: Countryside Cottage
Description: A charming two-bedroom cottage surrounded by peaceful countryside. Perfect for anyone seeking relaxation, natural surroundings, and a slower pace of life, while still being within reach of essential amenities.
